task_1: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the WeatherToolkit using Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/1_weather_agent.py
task_2: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the SearchToolkit using the Gemini model to search DuckDuckGo. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/2_duckduckgo_agent.py
task_3: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the BrowserToolkit and PPTToolkit to search for information about CAMEL-AI and generate slides. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/3_browser_slide_agent.py
task_4: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the TerminalToolkit and CodeExecutionToolkit. Prompt it to retrieve system information and print it in a Python interpreter. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/4_terminal_sysinfo_agent.py
task_5: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the MCPToolkit using DeepWiki server (see https://mcpservers.org/servers/devin/deepwiki) to retrieve the architecture of the camel-ai/oasis repository. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/5_deepwiki_mcp_agent.py
task_6: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the VideoAnalysisToolkit and VideoDownloadToolkit. Prompt it to download and analyze the YouTube video https://www.youtube.com/shorts/SpoMkdAK4GU. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/7_youtube_analysis_agent.py
task_7: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the ArxivToolkit. Prompt it to download the paper "Attention Is All You Need" and then use vector retrieval to answer "What is a Transformer?". Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/8_arxiv_rag_transformer_agent.py
task_8: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with longterm memory and HumanToolkit. Write an example query to test it. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/9_longterm_memory_single_agent.py
task_9: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the ChatAgent class to create an agent with the MemoryToolkit to manage memory and run query examples. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/10_memory_toolkit_agent.py
task_10: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with workers using different tools to answer: "What was the actual enrollment count of the clinical trial on H. pylori in acne vulgaris patients from Jan-May 2018 as listed on the NIH website?". Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/1_answer_question.py
task_11: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with a Python Programmer worker with code execution tools, an info collector worker with LinkUp tools for math problems, and other defined roles. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/2_multi_role_workforce.py
task_12: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with one worker for weather search, another for historical information, and a third as tourist. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/3_travel_guide_workforce.py
task_13: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with workers using OpenAI, Gemini, and Qwen models to discuss which model performs best. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/4_model_comparison_workforce.py
task_14: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with one worker using MCPToolkit (DeepWiki server, see https://mcpservers.org/servers/devin/deepwiki) to retrieve CAMEL-AI info, and another worker with PPTToolkit to generate slides. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/5_mcp_ppt_workforce.py
task_15: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the KnowledgeGraphAgent class to create a knowledge graph agent with LinkUp tools to retrieve webpages related to LLM-based social simulation research and store them in Neo4j. Save the script to task-script-v0/single_agent/6_linkup_neo4j_agent.py
task_16: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with LinkUp search worker and data keeper worker with retrieval tools to retrieve and store LLM-based social simulation research. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/6_linkup_neo4j_workforce.py
task_17: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with a Qwen model worker and a video analysis worker to analyze ../oasis_introduction.mp4. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/7_youtube_analysis_workforce.py
task_18: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with Arxiv worker and vector memory worker to download "Attention Is All You Need" paper and answer "What is a Transformer?". Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/8_arxiv_rag_transformer_workforce.py
task_19: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce where every worker has longterm memory and browser tools. Give them a task to discuss. Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/9_longterm_memory_chat_workforce.py
task_20: Search for the appropriate reference, and use the Workforce class to create a workforce with a memory worker using memory tools and a student worker to answer: "If this whole pint is made up of ice cream, how many percent above or below the US federal standards for butterfat content is it when using the standards as reported by Wikipedia in 2020? Answer as + or - a number rounded to one decimal place.". Save the script to task-script-v0/workforce/10_memory_query_workforce.py
